abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Jynx from your hand onto Smoochum (this counts as evolving Smoochum) and remove all damage counters from Smoochum.

effect.en: Flip a coin. If heads, choose a Special Energy card attached to 1 of your opponent's Pok√©mon and have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.
